### General Notes: {-}

```{block, note-text, type='rmdnote'}
1.  Please bring a notebook and pencil to every class.  
2.  Access the [DataCamp](https://datacamp.com) assignments via [AsULearn](https://asulearn.appstate.edu)
```

* * *

* Week 1: Review concepts and ideas from `rmarkdown`, `knitr`, `bookdown`, Git, and GitHub
    
    + [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/)
    
    + [knitr](https://yihui.name/knitr/)
    
    + [bookdown: Authoring Books and Technical Documents with R Markdown](https://bookdown.org/yihui/bookdown/)
    
    + [Happy Git and GitHub for the useR](http://happygitwithr.com/)

    
```{block, week1optional, type='rmdoptional'}   
Optional Resources:

* [DataCamp: Reporting with R Markdown course](https://www.datacamp.com/courses/reporting-with-r-markdown)

* [DataCamp: Working with the RStudio IDE (1) course](https://www.datacamp.com/courses/working-with-the-rstudio-ide-part-1)

* [DataCamp: Working with the RStudio IDE (2) course](https://www.datacamp.com/courses/working-with-the-rstudio-ide-part-2)
``` 

* Individual Assignment - Reproduce Appendix E.1 from MDSR using `bookdown`

* * *

* Weeks 2, 3, and 4

    + Regression Modeling (Read Appendix E)

    + Complete [DataCamp Correlation and Regression](https://www.datacamp.com/courses/correlation-and-regression)

      + Complete [DataCamp Multiple and Logistic Regression](https://www.datacamp.com/courses/multiple-and-logistic-regression)

```{block, type='rmdoptional'}   
Optional Resources:

* [DataCamp: Inference for Linear Regression](https://www.datacamp.com/courses/inference-for-linear-regression)

```    

* Team Assignment - Complete Exercises E.1 - E.4

* * *

* Weeks 5 and 6

      + Data Wrangling (Read chapter 4 of MDSR)
      
      + Tidy data and iteration (Read chapter 5 of MDSR)
      
      + Complete [DataCamp: Introduction to the Tidyverse](https://www.datacamp.com/courses/introduction-to-the-tidyverse)
      
```{block, type='rmdoptional'}   
Optional Resources:

* [DataCamp: Data Manipulation in R with dplyr ](https://www.datacamp.com/courses/dplyr-data-manipulation-r-tutorial)

```       
      
* Team Assignment - Complete Exercises 4.1 - 4.4; 5.1 - 5.4   

* * *

* Week 7 

    + Statistical foundations (Read Chapter 7 of MDSR)
    
    +  Individual assignment - Complete Exercises 7.1 - 7.5

* * *

* Week 8 

    + Simulation (Read Chapter 10 of MDSR)
    
    + Complete [DataCamp: Foundations of Probability in R](https://www.datacamp.com/courses/foundations-of-probability-in-r)
    
* Team assignment - Complete Exercises 10.3, 10.4, 10.6, and 10.7
    
* * *

* Weeks 9, 10, 11

    + Statistical learning and predictive analytics - Read Chapter 8 of MDSR
    
    + Complete [DataCamp: Supervised Learning in R: Regression](https://www.datacamp.com/courses/supervised-learning-in-r-regression)
    
    + Complete [DataCamp: Supervised Learning in R: Classification](https://www.datacamp.com/courses/supervised-learning-in-r-classification)

* Individual assignment - Complete Exercises 8.1 - 8.3

* * *

* Weeks 12, 13

* Unsupervised learning (Read chapter 9 of MDSR)

    + Complete [DataCamp: Unsupervised Learning in R](https://www.datacamp.com/courses/unsupervised-learning-in-r)

    + Individual Assignment - Complete Exercises 9.1 - 9.5
    
